sentences.en: A 10 to 15 percent deviation is considered acceptable.
a compass deviation of 5˚ (= from true north)
sentences.cn: 罗盘偏差5度（相对正北而言）

sentences.en: A minimal error or deviation may result in wide divergence.
Deviation from a straight - line response to an input signal.
sentences.cn: 对输入信号的响应偏离直线的程度.

sentences.en: Deviation from the norm is not tolerated.
sentences.cn: 不能容忍离经叛道行为。

sentences.en: deviation from the previously accepted norms
Deviation from this rule are very rare.
sentences.cn: 很少有违反这条规则的.

sentences.en: Deviation is justifiable to save life or property.
sentences.cn: 如果是因人命和财产的救助,绕航是合理的行为.

sentences.en: He now bore off to the right to counteract the possible deviation from his true course.
sentences.cn: 因此,他为了校正,就朝右面走,以便走上正确的路程.

sentences.en: In other words, for most transparent materials the greater the deviation, the greater the dispersion.
sentences.cn: 换句话说, 对大多数透明物质而言,偏向愈大,色散愈大.

sentences.en: Ray a is reflected and transmitted without deviation.
sentences.cn: 光线α被反射,且传播时无偏移.

sentences.en: The most serious deviation from the perfect competition comes from monopoly elements.
sentences.cn: 最严重的对完全竞争的背离来源于垄断成份.

sentences.en: The positive square root of the variance is called the standard deviation.
sentences.cn: 方差的正的平方根叫做标准差.

sentences.en: The slightest reluctance or deviation in carrying out this policy was to be reported to me.
sentences.cn: 执行这一决定时,如有人表示丝毫的迟疑或发生过失,均应向我报告.

sentences.en: The standard deviation from the mean is the preferred quantity.
sentences.cn: 用平均值得出标准偏差是优先采用衡量的单位.

sentences.en: To abstain from meat was a serious deviation.
sentences.cn: 茹素是比较严重的反常行为。

words.tran_cn: 路线偏差分子的；右倾分子的；左倾分子的
不正常者；偏移值；变异物
（政党内）路线偏差分子；异端分子

phrases.tran_cn: 角度偏差；角偏移；角偏向
平均误差，平均离差；均差
横向偏差；水平偏斜；侧向偏离
平均偏差；平均偏移；均差
相对标准偏差；相对标准差

trans.tran_en: a noticeable difference from what is expected or acceptable
